participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: He is adventurous and creative, always looking for inspiration for his next artistic project.
participant_1.background: i have a weakness for vanilla ice cream. my favorite season is winter. i have a hat collection of over 1000 hats. i love cats and have two cats. i won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics.

participant_2.name: Margaret
participant_2.personality: She is nurturing and wise, often sharing her experiences with a touch of humor.
participant_2.background: i do not have a smartphone. i'm retired and living the great life. i can sew my own clothes. i had cancer but its gone now. i have amazing children and grandchildren.
